name: Luigi's Maze-sion
description: Luigi has won a contest from Professor E. Gadd to go explore a spooky mansion, but this mansion is a little peculiar than he imagined. Inside this place is a maze where Luigi has to go through it in order to save a star that's located at the very end.  He also has to conquer his fear of ghostly enemies and some non-ghostly enemies and has to face his biggest nightmare of all: King Boo! Help Luigi get through this maze and save his friends before the king of all Boos traps them in a painting forever!
